toc.tocitem:
Functions
Dynamic Statistical Visualization add2spmAdd objects to the scatter plot matrix cdsplotCandlestick plot for robust model selection covplotForward plot of the monitoring of the trajectories of elements of the covariance (correlation) matrix fanplotForward plot of the monitoring of the score test statistic histFSplots a histogram with the elements in each bin grouped according to a vector of labels. levfwdplotPlots the trajectories of leverage along the search malfwdplotPlots the trajectories of Mahalanobis distances along the search malindexplotPlots the Mahalanobis distances against index number or any other variable mdrplotPlots the trajectory of minimum deletion residual (mdr) along the search mmdplotPlots the trajectory of minimum Mahalanobis distance (mmd) along the search olslineAdd least-squares fit line(s) to scatter plot(s) resfwdplotPlots the trajectories of scaled (squared) residuals along the search resindexplotPlots the residuals against index number or any other variable selectdataFSGraphical selection of data points on scatter plot matrices or trajectories in the forward plots using the mouse spmplotScatterplot matrix with dynamic scatters and histograms yXplotGraphical selection of data points on scatter plot matrices or trajectories in the forward plots using the mouse
Robust linear regression and transformations addtAdded t test FSRForward search in linear regression with automatic outlier detection procedure FSRaddtForward added t-tests for each explanatory variable FSRbonfboundTheoretical Bonferroni bounds of minimum deletion residual FSRbsbUnits belonging to the subset in each step of the forward search FSRedaForward search in linear regression with exploratory data analysis purposes FSRenvmdrTheoretical envelopes of Minimum Deletion Residual outside subset during the search FSRfanScore test statistic for transformation in each step of the forward search FSRmdrStores minimum deletion residual and other basic regression quantities. LXSLeast Median of Squares or Least Trimmed of squares minscaleComputes minimum value of the scale MMregMM estimators in linear regression MMregcoreMM estimators in linear regression SregS estimator in linear regression ScoreScore test for transformation
Robust model selection FSRaddtForward added t-tests for each explanatory variable FSRcpForward Cp for models of interest FSRmsModel selection using Cp
Robust multivariate analysis and transformations FSMForward search in multivariate analysis with automatic outlier detection procedure FSMbonfboundTheoretical Bonferroni bounds of minimum Mahalanobis distance in each step of the forward search. FSMedaForward search in multivariate analysis with exploratory data analysis purposes FSMenvmmdTheoretical envelopes of Minimum Mahalanobis Distance outside subset during the search FSMfanMultivariate transformations (validation step) FSMmmdStores minimum Mahalanobis Distance (uses fast recursive routines) FSMmmdeasyStores minimum Mahalanobis Distance (does not use recursive routines) FSMtraMultivariate transformations (estimation step) mcdMinimum covariance determinant minscaleComputes minimum value of the scale MMmultMM estimators in Multivariate Analysis MMmultcoreMM estimators in Multivariate Analysis mveMinimum volume ellipsoid SmultS estimators in Multivariate Analysis unibivDetects univariate and bivariate outliers.
Interactive demo tools with GUIs BrushRESExample of interactive brushing starting from the monitoring residual plot BrushFANExample of interactive brushing starting from the FAN plot BrushROBExample of interactive brushing starting from the index plot of robust residuals
Utilities clickableMultiLegendMake legends clickable in a scatter plot matrix dsxy2figxyTransform points or positions from axis coords to figure coords ellipseDraw an ellpse starting from loc vector and scatter matrix FScolorsA MATLAB class encapsulating some common color definitions fsminvmmdConverts values of minimum Mahalanobis distance into confidence levels fsrinvmdrConverts values of minimum deletion residual into confidence levels mahalFSMahalanobis distances from supplied centroid and covariance matrix normBoxCoxNormalized Box-Cox transformation quickselectfsFinds the k-th ordered statistic rescaleRescale data in a given interval TBbdpFinds constant c of Tukey biweight given breakdown point TBcFinds breakdownpoint and efficiency given constant c TBeffFinds constant c of Tukey biweight given nominal efficiency TBpsiFunction ψ(x) for Tukey biweight TBrhoFunction ρ(x) for Tukey biweight TBweiFunction w=ψ(x)/x for Tukey biweight
Combinatorial bcBinomial Coefficient combsFSAll possible combinations of n elements taken k at time nchoosekFSBinomial coefficient or matrix containing all combinations randsampleFSRandom sample, with or without replacement shufflingRandom permutation of the elements of a vector subsetsIndexes of distinct subsets extracted from a set of n elements
